entities.description: Long-lasting or repeated emotional or mental health issues.
Impact of hallucinogen use on emotional or mental health problems.
Activities such as spending time with friends and family, attending special events at work or school, participating in hobbies and sports, and attending religious services and events.
Reduction in participation in important activities due to hallucinogen use.
Problems such as missing a lot of work or school, getting demoted, losing a job, getting suspended, being expelled, dropping out of school, or failing to take care of family.
Impact of hallucinogen use causing serious problems at work, school, or home.

relationships.description: Hallucinogen use causing emotional or mental health problems.
Hallucinogen use impacting participation in important activities.
Hallucinogen use reducing participation in important activities.
Hallucinogen use causing serious problems at work, school, or home.
Hallucinogen use having an impact on emotional or mental health problems.
